item.description:
Relax and unwind while enjoying some great music with your meetup friends.

This is Opening Night for Claflin Hill's Night at the Band Stand
Featuring The Jerry Seeco Seven

Bring a chair and sweater
Food and beverages are available for sale

Try to arrive around 6 pm to find parking, get a spot on the lawn, and socialize before the music starts at 6:30 pm. Music ends at 8:30 pm.

Look for Jacki in the purple chair and rainbow umbrella towards the back row of people.
Call if you can't find us: 508-381-1529

If it rains it's cancelled.
item.name: Evening Outdoor Jazz Concert - Milford
